categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: T'alla was a Neti Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order when the Jedi were based on Ossus.

A Jedi Master from Nerit, T'alla constructed a massive garden complex on Ossus. After establishing the gardens, T'alla planted herself at the center and entered into the tree-like life-cycle of her species. Jedi gathered around the tree-form of T'alla for many millennia, growing and expanding the gardens for generations.
